# Instagram Automation Platform

## Quick Start

1. **Configure Instagram App**:
   - Go to [Meta for Developers](https://developers.facebook.com/)
   - Create a new app or use existing
   - Add Instagram product
   - Copy App ID and App Secret

2. **Set Environment Variables**:
   - `INSTAGRAM_APP_ID`: Your Meta App ID
   - `INSTAGRAM_APP_SECRET`: Your Meta App Secret
   - `FACEBOOK_APP_ID`: (Optional) For Facebook integration
   - `FACEBOOK_APP_SECRET`: (Optional) For Facebook integration

3. **Configure OAuth Redirect**:
   - In Meta Dashboard, add OAuth Redirect URI:
   - `https://your-domain.com/api/auth/instagram/callback`

4. **Setup Webhooks** (One-time):
   - In Meta Dashboard → Products → Webhooks
   - Subscribe to Instagram object
   - Callback URL: `https://your-domain.com/api/webhooks/instagram`
   - Verify Token: `zenthra` (hardcoded)
   - Subscribe to: messages, feed, mentions

5. **Access Your App**:
   - Navigate to your domain
   - Register an account
   - Connect Instagram via OAuth
   - Start creating automation flows!

## Default Credentials

- Database: Auto-configured via Easypanel
- Admin: Create during first visit

## Features

- ✅ Visual drag-and-drop flow builder
- ✅ Multi-account Instagram management
- ✅ Real-time webhook integration
- ✅ Automated DM & comment responses
- ✅ Condition-based logic (if/else)
- ✅ Contact management
- ✅ Activity logging & analytics
- ✅ Pre-built flow templates

## Support

For issues or questions:
- GitHub: [Repository Issues](https://github.com/yourusername/instagram-automation/issues)
- Documentation: Check the README.md

## Security Notes

- Keep your Instagram App Secret secure
- Use strong passwords for database
- Enable HTTPS in production
- Regularly backup your database
